name: Capybear
description: The Capybear is a medium-sized creature with strong physical traits and a unique combination of abilities that help it thrive in swampy environments.
memorable: Its ability to provide tactical support for its allies makes it a notable companion in combat.
goals: To inhabit swampy areas while utilizing camouflage for ambush tactics and support its pack.
relations: Often found alongside other Capybears, using their pack intelligence to coordinate attacks.
environment: Swamps and muddy terrains, where it can effectively use its camouflage.
strengths: Possesses strong physical stats and abilities for mobility and group tactics.
weaknesses: Notably low intelligence can hinder strategic planning during encounters.
attacks: Capybear delivers powerful melee attacks with both a biting and slamming option, taking advantage of prone targets.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics, which allows it to gain advantage when an ally is nearby, enhancing its offensive capabilities.
senses: It has keen smell, granting it advantage on perception checks that rely on smell.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, improving its awareness in its environment.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for up to 30 minutes.
Gains advantage on stealth checks in swampy terrain.
Can knock enemies prone with Pounce ability.
Can intercept attacks directed at allies, showcasing its protective nature.
Utilizes terrain to enhance its ambush capabilities.
test_queries: creature that can swim and knock targets prone
pack creature that uses keen smell to hunt
aquatic creature with strong melee attacks
monstrosity that protects allies in combat
